body.name: MKYSAIL Toaster,Microwave Toaster, Sandwich Maker, Waffle Maker, Panini Maker, Dishwasher Safe,NO Electricity,Wireless,Time Saving,Fast (Orange, Microwave Sandwich and Waffle Maker)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 27 mins
features: 1. Innovative, Safe and Fast Microwave Toaster: Upper and lower rubber boards absorb microwave → thermal energy conversion → upper and lower metal grill plates absorb heatwave → concentrate thermal energy to the food → instantly rising above 260 degrees C in 1 minute → offer you tasty delicious meals in minutes. Microwave power applied to mimic conventional cooking, save you time and keep food nutrients in.

2. Advanced Microwave and Heatwave Technologies for Crispy and Scrummy Food: The upper and lower rubber boards fitted with two metal grill plates, feature the advanced microwave and heatwave technologies, toasting food evenly and simultaneously. The two plates securely fitted into the heatproof silicone casings. The silicone clips used to seal the outer casings together.

3. Dishwasher Safe and No Electric Power: After the micro toastie cools down, place it in the dishwasher or submersed in the washing up water with a soft cloth for hand washing. Taken apart for seamless clean-up, without any crumbs cling on the micro toaster. This microwavable cookware toaster designed without electric wire. No mess of wires coiling up helps to put aside in good order.

4. Cook a Range of Meals Easily in Microwave: Use your micro toastie to cook a range of your favorite foods, bread, sandwich, croissant, panini, bagel, veggie, potato, burgers, sausages, fish, bacon, steak, frozen beef, lamp chop, chicken, hog dog, omelet, pastry, sliced loaf, pan bread, tortilla, and a lot more. Microwave oven time just depends on how brown and crispy you want your toast, adjusted to suit your personal tastes.

5. MKYSAIL Micro Toastie Maker vs Conventional Toaster: MYKSAIL toasty maker revolutionizes your microwave cookware, instantly heated up and toasted in minutes, timing control, wireless, dishwasher safe, detachable parts. Conventional electric toaster, powered by electric supply, slow and preheated toaster, electric wire, not taken apart, not be immersed in water and dishwasher.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MKYSAIL Microwave Oven Toaster Makes Great Tasting Snacks in Minutes Rapidly rising above 260 degrees C in 1 min, no preheat required. Feel joyful in the microwave oven with MRVSAIL micro toastie maker! Make golden, crispy, yummy meals in minutes. Just open the toastie maker, fill in your ingredients, clamp, microwave in minutes, flip your toastie midway through cooking, and greet your crunchy and yummy toastie joy to come to life.

Multi-Functional Cooking Use the micro grill toaster to achieve delicious grilled meals without any hassle. Cook everything you would like in your microwave oven, such as bread, sandwich, croissant, panini, bagel, veggie, potato, burger, frozen beef burger, sausage, fish, bacon, etc.. Innovative Microwave Safe Technology The two technologically-forged metal grill plates with microwave-absorbing rubber boards accumulate microwave and heatwave energy directly into the meals, whilst a conventional raw metal plate cannot be put in to avoid sparking. Non-stick Grill Plates, Silicone Casings, BPA and PFOA Free The two non-stick grill plates on top and bottom contribute to more convenient micro cooking and easier clean-up. The plates incased in the two silicone shells, stainless. The edges are pinched. The clips designed to be elastic, thus to fit in any food you like in different thickness.

Dishwasher Safe & Thorough Cleaning & Easy Storage All parts are dishwasher safe, or immersed in the washing water with hand washing. Certainly, you can wipe it down after use without fully disassembling. Easy to disassemble and reassemble the toastie.Wireless design saves you the trouble of coiling up the electric cord. Portable for work as long as your work has a microwave. It greatly enhances convenience than non-detachable wired toasters.

BPA and PFOA free, FDA certification. For best results! Stay safe! Stay healthy! Set microwave between 700-1000W; Timing adjusted to suit different food and your personal tastes; Turn the toaster over half way through cooking for more crispy you want your toast; Spread butter on the outside bread for extra golden results; For repeated use, reduce cooking time by 20 min. For more cooking tips, please check the attached two PDF files, users’ manual and recipe guide of Users Guide of MKYSAIL Microwave Toaster. Just enjoy your fast and pleasant cooking!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good design, better results than pan grilling
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to swap out the grilling and waffle plates. Liking the results a lot as the buttered exteriors of the bread is coming out less greasy feeling than when the same sammie is pan grilled. Comes apart easily and gets run thru the dishwasher for easy cleanup. A+ product.
